channel.title: Need help with 2 things
channel.description:
Hey everyone, I've been having trouble lately with two problems. Not so much problems but things I need help with. 1. Many people ask this question all the time but from some of the topics there aren't many replies. How do you make your player follow the person your attacking while ranging. Like in runescape the player ranging would run after the person still firing. How do I make that happen? If you know or even have the slightest idea please post.
2. Interfaces-- Now I'm not sure if these are custom interfaces but they seem so. I'll show you. [IMG]http://i922.photobucket.com/albums/ad61/Luke_ya_digg/sv6g7c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i922.photobucket.com/albums/ad61/Luke_ya_digg/lol.png[/img] (I found these pictures on the server status page) Things like that. How do I do that. If anyone knows how please tell me. Because I've seen the Pest control interface in 2Speced and I really wanted to use it. And the other one I could use for many other interfaces such as Assault, etc.
Thanks for reading and please reply. Thank you. :)
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 28, 2009, 09:25:59 pm[/size][hr]Anybody willing to help?

send them a pm on moparscape. or log on the server and talk to the owner.
